name: Super Ultra Dead Rising 3 Arcade Remix Hyper Edition EX Plus Alpha
summary: Super Dead Rising 3 Arcade Remix adds an all new four-player co-op mode to Dead Rising 3. Play as Frank West, Chuck Greene, Nick Ramos and Annie Greene or cosplay as your favorite Capcom characters to use their signature attacks and super moves to save the city from zombie hordes, dangerous shadow bosses and giant super zombies. Compete for the top score, unlock new characters and fight for survival in true Capcom style! Shoryuken!!
